VIST.short_name: Vista Oil & Gas, S.A.B. de C.V.
VIST.long_name: Vista Oil & Gas, S.A.B. de C.V.
VIST.summary: Vista Oil & Gas, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas in Latin America. It principally owns producing assets in Argentina, as well as in Mexico. As of December 31, 2019, it had proved reserves of 101.8 MMBOE. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
